findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The smart contract may allow an unauthorized user to upgrade the script.

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The mint function allows an unlimited number of tokens to be created without any restrictions.

findings.title: validRecipient
findings.description: The transfer and transferFrom functions do not validate the recipient address.

findings.title: onlyOwner
findings.description: The onlyOwner modifier is used to restrict access to certain functions, but it may not be properly implemented or validated.

findings.title: Swapping
findings.description: The swapping functions (swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens, swapExactETHForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens, etc.) may be vulnerable to attacks due to fee-on-transfer tokens.
